attributes.action: Increase the Jail term for gang rape to life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current number of gang rapes occurring in Britain is alarming and seems to be on the increase. We need to increase the penalties for such violent acts which leave the victims lives in taters. We need to start feeling safe to let our children, families and friends be able to go out. We are currently expected to see violence as an every day risks an take precautions.
